reviewText:
Contains these 10 movies on 5 dvds:

Fantasy Mission Force (1982) - Fullscreen, English dubbed
Fist Of Anger (1973)(incorrectly titled "Young Tiger" in this set) - Letterboxed Widescreen, English dubbed
Heroine (1973) - Anamorphic Widescreen, English dubbed
Karate Warriors (1976) - Anamorphic Widescreen, English dubbed
The Bodyguard (1973) - Anamorphic Widescreen, English dubbed
Fist Of Fear, Touch Of Death (1980) - Letterboxed Widescreen, English
The Cub Tiger From Kwang Tung (1973) - Anamorphic Widescreen, Mandarin with Chinese/English subtitles (burnt-in)
Chinese Hercules (1973) - Fullscreen, English dubbed
Golgo 13 (1977) - Anamorphic Widescreen, English dubbed
Sister Street Fighter (1974) - Anamorphic Widescreen, Japanese (5.1 or 2.0) with English subtitles or English dubbed

The Sonny Chiba movies are available in other sets released by BCI, but you do get anamorphic versions of Cub Tiger and Heroine in this set.
